duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide structural and physics-based modeling, simulation, and analysis.
Perform implicit and explicit simulations such as static load and product drop.
Utilize commercially available Finite Element Analysis and numerical modeling tools such as Abaqus, ANSYS Mechanical, LS-Dyna, Cosmos, Matlab, etc.
Complete hand calculations and second-order simulations (e.g. statics, mechanics of materials, MATLAB, etc.)
Design, build, and test structural prototypes to validate analysis.
Collaborate with cross-functional engineering teams to ensure simulations are realistic and aligned with design intent.
Present results in a form actionable by cross-functional team members and leadership.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's or Master's degree in Mechanical Engineering, Structural Engineering, or related field.
